summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of a score-based stochastic differential equation (SDE) variance-exploding (VE) scheduler, covering configuration handling, forward computation, sampling procedures (including deterministic sampling), sigma values, step dimensions, time indexing, and execution of a full inference loop without added noise.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the SDE VE scheduler used in diffusion model pipelines, enabling reliable integration and deployment in machineâ€‘learning applications.
